website_summaries.verdict: This fridge offers a lot more space than others and includes a separate compartment for freezer items.
pros: The freezer works well, without affecting the temperature of the refrigerator
Holds a lot of food for a mini fridge
Beverage can holder on the door
cons: At 37 inches tall, this unit will be bigger than many other mini fridge options for students

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't ship well and is fragile.
customer_reviews.text: We had to return the first one after opening an undamaged box to find a large dent in the freezer door. We recieved a replacement a couple days later. The back right corner is pushed in. This refrigerator is very fragile and doesn't ship well. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Totman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's dorm. So far it's working out just fine. Not sure what's all in it now but he's happy with the purchase and is sharing it with his roommates. We did wait 24 hrs to plug it in as it was layed on it's side when transporting it. No issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Fridge
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great mini fridge. We have had it for 2 weeks and it works great. Keeps things frozen in freezer and food cold in the fridge. It is spacious inside and has convenient shelves, drawers and door compartments. It came dent free, which was a bonus! We have it in our garage, on a sturdy bench table. The only thing I notice is that the side feels warm to the touch, maybe it's because the garage is hot at times while it is summer time. But I would recommend this fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Rayfasa

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini fridge. Does need ice removed often from back.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and works ok, however, it ices up very quickly on the back of the refrigerator area. It's much more than our previous fridge. Also keep in mind the area the freezer takes up makes the fridge area quite small. No problems, just a lot of ice cleaning and freezes things in the back of the fridge easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Keeps things cold. However the thing leaks inside the fridge part. I have to sop up water every couple days. Noise level isn’t bad though.
customer_reviews.author: AprilMarie617

customer_reviews.title: It arrived safely and in perfect condition. Have not plugged it in and hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson's college dorm room. It arrived safely and in perfect condition. Have not plugged it in and hoping it fits the bill for his dorm room!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Leith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom. I love it. I like that it had a separate freezer door because the single door freezers never seem to work like they should. It also has a lot of room and several compartments as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is great only thing I have to say that’s bad is the shipping it arrived on time but when I took it out of the box there was a huge dent in the freezer door not happy about that I’d have returned it but I was on a time restraint as I’m an over the road truck driver and my old refrigerator in my truck died completely and I only have 4 days of home time a month and I need a fridge now so I just kept
customer_reviews.author: Becca K

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Love the separate freezer door nice compact size. I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: At just a little above the recommended temperature setting it keeps everything nice and cold. Freezer temperature is excellent. Ice Cream stays hard. It does stay a little warm to the side touch. Looks great, however, mine came with a small DENT right in the middle of the freezer door. No damage to the packaging so I guess it was packaged that way. I'll use it as is.
customer_reviews.author: William A Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge/freezer but ices up
customer_reviews.text: Useful with a nice amount of space for a compact refrigerator/freezer. The major problem is how often the freezer ices up. It’s a frequent occurrence. If anyone has any suggestions, I’d love to hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M Magaziner

customer_reviews.title: Great secondary fridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary fridge for my house, it usually holds my drinks and ice creams, come in handy when we have to much left over food! The finish is also quite nice and upscale. It's funny there is a dent on the right rear as another reviews stated, I might have gotten their returned unit but it works great and is in otherwise pristine condition. Did not want to go through all the hassals returning it just for a cosmetic dent.
customer_reviews.author: wen c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for mini fridge, do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: Size, style is just right & very quiet . It is perfect addition to bonus room. Freezer is very cold. Love it!...totally satisfied. Do not hesitate
customer_reviews.author: Lena A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is fairly quiet
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my office. Looks nicer than some small fridge and keeps my I've cream bars frozen!
customer_reviews.author: N. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a small refrigerator on our lanai for a couple of years. I was tired of wet bodies in and out of the house to get a drink while swimming. It’s very quiet and a good size for our purpose. Even have popsicles in the freezer. Have been using for 6 weeks and no issues to date. I only regret I didn’t buy one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cat M

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was branded Haier. No explanation. It’s much smaller than the previous GE I had which was supposed to have the same capacity, and is much more frost-prone. I would not reorder this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: great fridge
customer_reviews.text: came packed very securely and keeps my food cold. freezer works very well to keep my ice and ice cream frozen.
customer_reviews.author: flame

customer_reviews.title: NOT COOLING WELL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mini fridge to store my son's medications at the required temperature. Wasn't cooling well enough. Had to buy ice to keep the fridge compartment cold. The freezer compartment freezes well though.
customer_reviews.author: oluyinka agboola

customer_reviews.title: Nice large freezer/ fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought for office. Works great no issues likes that it has large freezer, held 3 full size pies! And separate fridge part.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Klein

customer_reviews.title: Performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on July 6 in perfect condition. I waited 24 hours to turn it on as instructed set setting to four, and is working perfectly keeps frozen foods frozen and my fresh foods are nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: When received it had a HUGE dent in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tondini

customer_reviews.title: dent in door
customer_reviews.text: ok. not good to have a dent in the door. you are risking damage to door if you order this
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my small lounge area. Arrived in perfect condition and keeps everything perfectly cool.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect one and more space than I expected. Did the job what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Shafiqul Islam

customer_reviews.title: Fridge has dents all over!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. It is a good size and looks durable, very disappointed I waited a Week for this even with the “Prime” selection when purchased. I definitely will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: savannah aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandmas room at the nursing home. She loves it. Makes no noise. Works great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight, freezer section work nice, but fridge space a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Amdall

customer_reviews.title: you have the wrong model number in the energy guide ...
customer_reviews.text: you have the wrong model number in the energy guide labe, it should be this instead from the manufactuer's website:
customer_reviews.author: Eric Curtis

product_meta.title: GE HC32TW10SV Compact Refrigerator, 3.2 cubic ft
product_meta.description: GE HC32TW10SV Haier 3. 2 cu. Ft. Compact refrigerator with full-width glass shelves, true separate freezer, dispense-a-can storage, and interior lighting, in virtual steel
feature_bullets: Full-width glass shelves - allows flexible storage solutions and easy clean up
True separate freezer - spacious storage for frozen food items, with a separate exterior door
Dispense-a-can storage - provides quick & easy access to your favorite drink
Interior lighting - makes locating items quick and easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
